weka.dl4j.iterators.instance

Class ResizeImageInstanceIterator

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.dl4j.iterators.instance.AbstractInstanceIterator
      • weka.dl4j.iterators.instance.ImageInstanceIterator
        • weka.dl4j.iterators.instance.ResizeImageInstanceIterator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, weka.core.OptionHandler, ConvolutionalIterator

    public class ResizeImageInstanceIterator
extends ImageInstanceIterator
    An iterator that loads images and resizes them.
